How are the fees distributed when creating an identity on the Verus network?

When creating an identity on the Verus network, the fees are distributed as follows:

* 20 VRSC to the referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined

The remaining funds, not paid to referrers, go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.
